message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your business operations. Before we proceed, I would like to propose an offer of $15000 for the product. This reflects its high quality and value, as well as my confidence in its ability to meet your needs.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on your product, I am seeking a more affordable solution. I am willing to pay $12000 for the product, which I believe strikes a good balance between quality and cost. I look forward to your response.
